articles.content: Some fifty years ago, the Apollo Program sent the first astronauts to the Moon. In addition to the many science experiments they conducted on the surface, the Apollo astronauts brought back samples o… [+4298 chars]

articles.title: After outcry, disgraced sexual harasser removed from astronomy manuscript - Science
articles.description: Geoff Marcy’s behavior became public in 2015, but he has continued to publish
articles.content: Within 2 weeks after a preprint was posted to arXiv on 31 March, outrage erupted on Twitter and multiple co-authors requested their names be removed. The issue wasn’t the science, which focused on th… [+7714 chars]

articles.title: The spineless cactus, a promising source of sustainable energy - Farmers Review Africa
articles.description: The spineless cactus, a promising source of sustainable energy
articles.content: The spineless cactus is a unique perennial plant that is able to yield close to 40 tons of dry matter per hectare per year with a rainfall of 500 mm per annum. This equates eight tons of biomethane o… [+5975 chars]
